Package com.ucla.jam.chat

Class ChatManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ucla.jam.chat.ChatManager
  • public class ChatManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles sending and getting chats. Also handles chat room creation, invitation, and updates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChatManager()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatManager

        public ChatManager()

    • Method Detail

      • sendChat

        public void sendChat​(Chat chat)
        Send given chat to chat room. Notifies all members of chatroom via websocket that a new chat has been sent. Throws UnknownChatroomException if the given chat room does not exist
        Parameters:
        chat - chat id may be left null

      • getChatsAfter

        public java.util.List<Chat> getChatsAfter​(java.util.UUID room,
                                          java.time.Instant after)
        Get list of chats for a given room after a given time.
        Parameters:
        room - Room UUID
        after - Instant to find chats after, exclusive
        Returns:
        List of chats, ordered by most recent first

      • getRecentChats

        public java.util.List<Chat> getRecentChats​(java.util.UUID room,
                                           int count)
        Get at most count chats for a given room.
        Parameters:
        room - Room UUID
        count - Maximum number of chats to retrieve
        Returns:
        List of chats, ordered by most recent first

      • userChatrooms

        public java.util.Collection<Chatroom> userChatrooms​(java.util.UUID userId)
        Get all chat rooms which given user is a member of.
        Parameters:
        userId - User UUID
        Returns:
        Unordered list of chat rooms

      • getChatroomIfMember

        public Chatroom getChatroomIfMember​(java.util.UUID userId,
                                    java.util.UUID roomId)
        Get the given chat room. Throws NotMemberException if the given user is not a member of given chat room Throws UnknownChatroomException if the given chat room does not exist
        Parameters:
        userId - User UUID
        roomId - Room UUID
        Returns:
        chat room which given user is a member of

      • updateChatroom

        public void updateChatroom​(Chatroom chatroom)
        Insert chat room, or update chat room with same id.
        Parameters:
        chatroom - Chat room to insert, Chatroom.members field will be ignored and may be empty

      • createChatroom

        public java.util.UUID createChatroom​(java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> members,
                                     java.util.UUID admin,
                                     java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new chat room with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        members - UUIDs of members of chat room. If admin is not included in this set, it will be added
        admin - Admin UUID
        name - Name of chat room
        Returns:
        UUID of created chat room

      • ensureDmChatroom

        public java.util.UUID ensureDmChatroom​(java.util.UUID userA,
                                       java.util.UUID userB)
        Ensure that a direct message chat room exists between the two given users. Will create a chat room if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        userA - UUID of userA
        userB - UUID of userB
        Returns:
        UUID of chat room

      • joinChatroom

        public void joinChatroom​(java.util.UUID userId,
                         java.util.UUID roomId)
        Given user will join given chat room. Throws NoInviteException if the given user has not been invited to given chat room.
        Parameters:
        userId - User UUID
        roomId - Room UUID

      • leaveChatroom

        public void leaveChatroom​(java.util.UUID userId,
                          java.util.UUID roomId)
        Given user will be removed from given chatroom. Throws NotMemberException if given user is not a member of given chat room. Throws DirectChatroomException if given chat room is a direct message chat room. Throws IsAdminException if the user to be removed is the chat room's admin
        Parameters:
        userId - User UUID
        roomId - Room UUID

      • inviteToChatroom

        public void inviteToChatroom​(java.util.UUID roomId,
                             java.util.UUID sourceId,
                             java.util.UUID targetId)
        Source user invites target user to given chat room. Throws NotMemberException if source user is not a member of given chat room. Throws DirectChatroomException if given chat room is a direct message chat room. Throws AlreadyMemberException if target user is already a member of given chat room.
        Parameters:
        roomId - Room UUID
        sourceId - Source user UUID
        targetId - Target user UUID

      • uninviteFromChatroom

        public void uninviteFromChatroom​(java.util.UUID roomId,
                                 java.util.UUID sourceId,
                                 java.util.UUID targetId)
        Source user removes invite target user's invite to given chat roon. Throws NoInviteException if target user is not invited to given chat room. Throws NoInviteException if source user did not originally invite target user to given chat rom
        Parameters:
        roomId - Room UUID
        sourceId - Source user UUID
        targetId - Target user UUID

      • rejectInvite

        public void rejectInvite​(java.util.UUID roomId,
                         java.util.UUID targetId)
        Remove invite for given user and given chatroom. Does nothing if no such invite exists.
        Parameters:
        roomId - Room UUID
        targetId - Target user UUID

      • removeFromChatroom

        public void removeFromChatroom​(java.util.UUID roomId,
                               java.util.UUID sourceId,
                               java.util.UUID targetId)
        Remove the target user from the given chat room. Throws NotAdminException if source user is not admin of given chat room. Triggers leaveChatroom.
        Parameters:
        roomId - Room UUID
        sourceId - Source user UUID
        targetId - Target user UUID

      • hasChatroom

        public boolean hasChatroom​(java.util.UUID userId,
                           java.util.UUID roomId)
        Checks if the given user is a member of the given chat room.
        Parameters:
        userId - User UUID
        roomId - Room UUID
        Returns:
        Returns true if the user is a member of the given chat room, and false otherwise
